alert.note: Alert for Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 7:46PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Albany, northwestern Greene and southeastern Schoharie Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 746 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prattsville, or 14 miles northwest of Hunter, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Windham, Gilboa, Prattsville, Livingstonville, Preston-Potter Hollow, Preston Hollow, Durham, Ashland, Conesville, West Settlement, Mosquito Point, North Lexington, Norton Hill, Huntersland, Manorkill, Broome Center, Smith Corner, Five Corners, Four Corners and North Settlement. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for east central New York.
